# skip rows=10; data rows=50
# IMF is Kroupa / Chabrier mix (approximate correction to Salpeter is /0.7)
# H0 = 70 km/s/Mpc
# data related to Figure 6 of Baldry, Glazebrook & Driver (2008)
# column 1: log stellar mass for centre of 0.1 dex bins 
# column 2: number of galaxies in bin (from average stellar masses)
# column 3: number density per dex per Mpc^3 (from average stellar masses)
# column 4: nominal Poisson error [= sqrt(sum of weights^2)]
# column 5: min number densities (from various stellar mass estimates)
# column 6: max num. dens. (from various estimates, multiplied by 1.13)
